title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
created_time: September 19, 2023, 03:32:11 PMLast edit: October 13, 2023, 01:29:48 AM by Little Mouse
content: Nitrobetting is looking for 13 forum users to advertise their brand among the bitcointalk community. If you are frequently active in the gambling section, we are looking for you, and feel free to apply.Payment in BTC13x Sr Member and above- $50/weekCampaign Rules1. Post-bursting isn't allowed, also, you can't post half of the post count in a day. Be usual, be a forum member. I have the right to deny any of your posts as eligible.2. A minimum of 10 posts in Gambling and/or Gambling Discussion is required to be eligible for the payment. A minimum total of 20 posts per week is required to get paid.3. Must have 5 earned merits in the last 120 days to apply.4. Posts in Altcoin Discussion, Off-topic, Games and Rounds, Investor-based games,  Invites & Accounts, Archival, Politics and Society, and any other signature/bounty campaign thread along with boards/threads where signature isn't displayed, won't be counted towards weekly post counts.5. A weekly maximum of 3 posts will be counted on the local board.6. Post in Nitrobetting ANN thread isn't mandatory to get paid but feedback on the casino in their ANN thread would be appreciated.7. If you have a negative tag, you may not get accepted BUT there's an exception based on the depth of the negative tag. 8. You, a person, are not allowed to enroll with more than one account.9. Each week will start on Friday and end on Thursday UTC 23:59:59.10. I and Nitrobetting reserve the right to pause the campaign at any time.11. If you are accepted, please wear signature, avatar, and personal text. Check out the spreadsheet whether your information is correct or not.SIGNATUREFull
